explanations.neural network: The paper mentions the use of a recurrent neural network (CRNN) in the control methodology.
explanations.deep learning: The use of recurrent neural networks and backpropagation indicates the application of deep learning techniques.
explanations.backpropagation: The paper specifically mentions Levenberg-Marquardt backpropagation (LMBP) as part of the control method.
explanations.BP: BP is short for backpropagation, which is explicitly mentioned in the paper.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The paper introduces a current recurrent neural network (CRNN) as part of the control methodology.
